segments.text: Professor , I'm concerned about my grades . Do you have a minute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , how can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to know if I am doing OK .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's pull out your scores so far . Do you think you are doing OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am afraid that I might not be doing all that well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm seeing that you are doing OK in some areas , but not so well in others .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I could take better notes and read a little more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can greatly improve your grades by always reflecting on what you can improve on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just do your best and I am sure that you will see improvement .
segments.speaker: S2
